result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James Anthony Robinson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court.  Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court for James Anthony Robinson.  Attorney Erin Michelle Karshen in court for State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Case calendared for Sentencing this date.  Due to the lateness of the hour, Defense requests adjournment as she has another commitment.  Court grants request.  Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 34, Judge Yamahiro in Room 423 of the Safety Building.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, that a plea of guilty or no contest to the crime you are charged may result in deportation, exclusion from admission to this country, or the denial of naturalization under federal law is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty AS AMENDED and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Court advised Defendant as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm/weapon and he may not vote until his civil rights are restored.

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court.  Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court for James Anthony Robinson.  Attorney Erin Michelle Karshen in court for State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Amended Information filed.  On State's motion, Court ordered charge amended to 3rd Degree Sexual Assault contrary to Wis. Stat. Section 940.225(3)(a); 939.50(3)(g).
Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  bm

Defendant James Robinson in court with Attorney Arial Rosenberg.  Erin Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Case calendared for Projected Guilty Plea this date.  Defense requests adjournment.  Court addresses Justice Point Violation and advises Defendant he must remain compliant with conditions of bail and must maintain contact with Justice Point.  Case adjourned for Projected Guilty Plea October 6, 2022 at 9:00 am
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and forwarded to Judge for review.  Court to address on the next date.  bm

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court.  Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court for James Anthony Robinson.  Attorney Erin Michelle Karshen in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Case in court for Calendar Call.  Court vacates warrant.  Defense requests a plea date.
Plea hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Case calendared for Calendar Call this date.  Matter did not appear on CCAP.  Case adjourned to September 1, 2022 at 8:30 am.  bm

Attorney Arial Rosenberg in Court.  Defendant James Robinson not in Court.  Erin Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date. Case adjourned for Calendar Call August 31, 2022 at 8:30 am
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  bm

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with AHS DOB: 9/16/2007
AMH DOB:8/11/2009

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Defendant appears for Calendar Call.  Warrant vacated.  Court admonished Defendant.  Defendant to establish contact with Justice Point.  Level 5 Supervision.  Case remains calendared for Projected Guilty Plea August 25, 2022 at 10:00 am

Attorney Travis Schwantes for Arial Jade Rosenberg in court.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Case calendared for Bail/Bond Hearing due to Justice Point Violation.     Defense requests a stayed warrant.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.  
  Calendar call scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Based on violation report received from Justice Point, Court sets bail hearing.  Parties emailed July 22, 2022.  No response from Attorney Rosenberg.  Case calendared for July 28, 2022 at 8:30 am.  bm
Justice Point Pretrial Services Discharge Summary Report received and filed.  bm
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with AHS DOB: 9/16/2007; AMH DOB:8/11/2009
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 SUPERVISION.  NO GPS.  All other conditins remain the same.

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant James Anthony Robinson in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court.  Case remains calendared for Projected Guilty Plea August 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant James Anthony Robinson in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Scheduling Conference held.  Defense requests a bail hearing and projected guilty plea date.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Defendant's Motion to Modify Bond received and filed.  bm

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant James Anthony Robinson in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in Court for Status Conference.  State made Offer.  Defense requested more time to review with Defendant.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with AHS, DDH, AMH, and HDS.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.  The Court ordered defendant LIMITED CURFEW; 24 hours.

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant James Anthony Robinson in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nk
Case in Court for Bail/Bond Hearing.  Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court. Court amends cash bail to $1000.00.  Status conference scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant James Anthony Robinson in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person  for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEARED BY VIDEO. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective J. Hunter.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 12. Defense wants to be heard on bail.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Public Defender Order Appointing Counsel.  Received and Filed.  nk

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with AHS DOB: 9/16/2007; AMH DOB:8/11/2009

Defendant James Anthony Robinson in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant James Anthony Robinson in custody.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  James Anthony Robinson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
